p: Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7 (ATCC® TIB­71™) were cultured in DMEM-F12 medium supplemented with penicillin and streptomycin (Sigma) and 10% heat-inactivated FBS in 96-well plates, at 37°C and under an atmosphere of 5% CO 2. The cells were seeded at a density of 10 4 cells/well with 100 μL medium and subculture every 3 days.
